title: 8.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Companies increasingly rely on cloud services for data storage and computational needs. These services, offered by companies like Amazon ( AWS ), Google ( GCP ), and Microsoft ( Azure ), need to be highly available and fault-tolerant. Discuss how redundancy is employed in cloud services to ensure fault tolerance. What could be the potential impacts on businesses if these services lack adequate redundancy and experience failure?

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
